ai_assistant_mock_responses.key_aramco: To pass the Aramco test, focus on their specific requirements, CES test if applicable, and practice common interview questions. We will have a dedicated section for this soon!
ai_assistant_mock_responses.key_chief_officer: Becoming a Chief Officer requires specific sea time as a Second Officer, relevant CoC, and advanced STCW courses. Our platform will guide you through the steps.
ai_assistant_mock_responses.key_career_plan: We can help with that! Tell me your current rank and goals, and I can outline a potential progression plan. Full AI planning is coming soon.
ai_assistant_mock_responses.key_jobs_experience: Please complete your profile on our main platform once launched! Our AI will then match you with suitable jobs. For now, what's your current rank and vessel type experience?
ai_assistant_mock_responses.default: That's an interesting question! I'm still learning. For detailed queries, please use the contact form for now. More advanced AI responses are coming with the full platform launch!

ai_transform_title: From Plan to Reality: Transform with AI
ai_transform_desc: Watch as our AI converts your data into tangible results.
